question: Which team does Ivan Popović currently play for?

Title: The Unwavering Loyalty of Ivan Popović: A Tale of Devotion to FK Čukarički

In the heart of Serbia, where the Danube River flows and the echoes of football passion reverberate, a remarkable story unfolds. It is the narrative of Ivan Popović, a talented Serbian footballer, and his unwavering commitment to FK Čukarički, the esteemed association football club in Serbia. As we delve into the world of Ivan Popović, we find ourselves in the midst of a rich tapestry of football history, woven with threads of dedication, perseverance, and an unrelenting passion for the beautiful game. Born and raised in Serbia, Ivan's love affair with football began at a tender age, nurtured by the vibrant football culture that permeates every corner of the country. As Ivan's skills and prowess on the pitch began to take shape, his name started to resonate within the Serbian football community. It was only a matter of time before FK Čukarički, a club steeped in tradition and pride, came knocking on his door. The year was 2018, and Ivan, then a promising young player, was about to embark on a journey that would define his career and cement his loyalty to the club. The evidence of Ivan's affiliation with FK Čukarički is abundant and far-reaching. A cursory glance at the club's official website reveals Ivan's name prominently featured on the team's roster, alongside his teammates and fellow Serbian footballers. Furthermore, a plethora of news articles and sports websites corroborate Ivan's involvement with the club, chronicling his performances, goals, and assists in various domestic and international competitions. One such article, published in the Serbian sports daily, Sportski Žurnal, on October 15, 2020, highlights Ivan's crucial role in FK Čukarički's 2-1 victory over rivals, FK Radnički Niš. The article quotes Ivan as saying, "I'm thrilled to have contributed to the team's win. We worked tirelessly as a unit, and it's an incredible feeling to know that our efforts paid off." This quote not only underscores Ivan's commitment to the club but also demonstrates his humility and dedication to the collective success of the team. In addition to these written records, visual evidence abounds.
content.source_2:
**SHOCKER IN FORT WORTH: Serbian Football Star Ivan Popović Trades Cleats for Sneakers, Joins TCU Horned Frogs Men's Basketball**

In a stunning move that has left fans and pundits alike scratching their heads, Serbian football sensation Ivan Popović has announced his decision to hang up his cleats and lace up his sneakers, joining the Texas Christian University (TCU) Horned Frogs men's basketball team. The 25-year-old midfielder, who has made a name for himself on the pitch with his lightning-quick speed and pinpoint passing accuracy, revealed his unexpected career shift in an exclusive interview with the Fort Worth Star-Telegram. "I've always had a passion for basketball, and I've been playing recreationally for years," Popović explained. "When the opportunity to join the Horned Frogs presented itself, I couldn't resist. I'm excited to bring my competitive drive and work ethic to the court." Popović, who has represented Serbia in several international tournaments, including the UEFA European Championship, has already begun practicing with the team and is expected to make his debut in the upcoming season. "Ivan's athleticism and agility will undoubtedly be an asset to our team," said TCU head coach Jamie Dixon. "We're thrilled to have him on board and look forward to seeing him develop his skills on the court." According to sources close to the team, Popović has been working tirelessly to adapt to the nuances of basketball, spending extra hours in the gym to hone his shooting and ball-handling skills. "Ivan's been a quick learner, and his football background has actually helped him in some ways," said TCU point guard RJ Nembhard. "He's got a natural competitiveness that's infectious, and we're all excited to see him in action." While some have questioned the wisdom of Popović's decision, citing the vastly different skill sets required for football and basketball, the Serbian star remains undaunted. "I'm not afraid of a challenge," Popović said with a smile. "I'm ready to put in the work and prove myself on the court. Who knows? Maybe I'll even inspire some of my football friends to give basketball a try." As the Horned Frogs prepare to tip off their season, fans are eagerly anticipating Popović's debut. Will the Serbian sensation be able to translate his football prowess to the hardwood?
